00025 UISearchResultsWidget::UISearchResultsWidget(boost::shared_ptr<SearchResultsModel> results_model,
00026                                              QWidget *parent) :
00027     QWidget(parent),
00028     m_results_view(new QTableView),
00029     m_results_status(new QLabel),
00030     m_filter_text(new QLineEdit),
00031     m_filter_delay_timer(new QTimer),
00032     m_filter_delay_typing_timeout_ms(500),
00033     m_proxy_model(new QSortFilterProxyModel(this)),
00034     m_results_model(results_model)
00035 {
00036     QT_CONNECT(m_results_view, SIGNAL(doubleClicked(const QModelIndex&)), this, SLOT(display_verse_text(const QModelIndex&)));
00037     QT_CONNECT(m_results_view, SIGNAL(customContextMenuRequested(const QPoint&)), this, SLOT(display_results_context_menu(const QPoint&)));
00038     QT_CONNECT(m_filter_text, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString)), this, SLOT(update_search_results_filter_delay_timer()));
00039     QT_CONNECT(m_filter_delay_timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(change_search_results_filter()));
00040 
00041     QHeaderView* header = m_results_view->horizontalHeader();
00042     header->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00043     header->setStretchLastSection(true);
00044 
00045     m_results_view->setShowGrid(false);
00046     m_results_view->setTextElideMode(Qt::ElideNone);
00047     m_results_view->setSortingEnabled(false);
00048     m_results_view->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
00049     
00050     m_proxy_model->setDynamicSortFilter(true);
00051     m_proxy_model->setFilterKeyColumn(SearchResultsModel::text_column);
00052     m_proxy_model->setSourceModel(m_results_model.get());
00053     m_results_view->setModel(m_proxy_model);
00054 
00055     m_results_status->setText(tr("No matches"));
00056     
00057     QLabel* filter_title = new QLabel(tr("Filter results:"));
00058 
00059     QGridLayout* top_line = new QGridLayout;
00060     top_line->setColumnMinimumWidth(1, 250);
00061     top_line->addWidget(m_results_status, 0, 0);
00062     top_line->addWidget(filter_title, 0, 2);
00063     top_line->addWidget(m_filter_text, 0, 3);
00064 
00065     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00066     layout->addLayout(top_line);
00067     layout->addWidget(m_results_view);
00068 
00069     setLayout(layout);
00070 }

00072 void UISearchResultsWidget::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* key_event)
00073 {
00074     if ((key_event->key() == Qt::Key_C) && (key_event->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier))
00075     {
00076         copy_selected_search_results();
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         QWidget::keyPressEvent(key_event);
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void UISearchResultsWidget::display_search_results(boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> query)
00085 {
00086     if (!m_filter_text->text().isEmpty())
00087     {
00088         m_filter_text->setText(QString());
00089     }
00090     m_results_view->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(m_results_view->verticalScrollBar()->minimum());
00091     m_results_view->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(m_results_view->horizontalScrollBar()->minimum());
00092     m_results_model->SetResults(query);
00093     m_results_view->resizeRowsToContents();
00094     update_results_status();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void UISearchResultsWidget::display_verse_text(const QModelIndex& index)
00098 {
00099     QModelIndex actualIndex = m_proxy_model->mapToSource(index);
00100     boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse_to_display = m_results_model->get_verse_display(actualIndex);
00101     if (verse_to_display->get_verse_id() != -1)
00102         emit verse_display_changed(verse_to_display);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void UISearchResultsWidget::update_search_results_filter_delay_timer()
00106 {
00107     m_filter_delay_timer->start(m_filter_delay_typing_timeout_ms);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void UISearchResultsWidget::change_search_results_filter()
00111 {
00112     emit results_filter_started(m_filter_text->text());
00113 
00114     m_filter_delay_timer->stop();
00115     m_proxy_model->setFilterRegExp(QRegExp(m_filter_text->text()));
00116     m_results_view->resizeRowsToContents();
00117     update_results_status();
00118 
00119     emit results_filter_completed();
00120 }

00122 void UISearchResultsWidget::copy_selected_search_results()
00123 {
00124     QItemSelectionModel* selection_model = m_results_view->selectionModel();
00125     if (selection_model)
00126     {
00127         QItemSelection item_selection = m_proxy_model->mapSelectionToSource(selection_model->selection());
00128         QModelIndexList selected_indexes = item_selection.indexes();
00129 
00130         std::sort(selected_indexes.begin(), selected_indexes.end());
00131         
00132         QModelIndex previous_index;
00133         QString text_to_paste;
00134 
00135         foreach (const QModelIndex& current_index, selected_indexes)
00136         {
00137             if (previous_index.row() != -1)
00138             {
00139                 if (current_index.row() == previous_index.row())
00140                 {
00141                     text_to_paste.append("\t");
00142                 }
00143                 else
00144                 {
00145                     text_to_paste.append("\n");
00146                 }
00147             }
00148 
00149             QVariant data = m_results_model->data(current_index, Qt::DisplayRole);
00150             text_to_paste.append(data.toString());
00151             
00152             previous_index = current_index;
00153         }
00154         QApplication::clipboard()->setText(text_to_paste);
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 void UISearchResultsWidget::select_all_search_results()
00159 {
00160     m_results_view->selectAll();
00161 }
00162 
00163 void UISearchResultsWidget::display_results_context_menu(const QPoint& position)
00164 {
00165     QMenu *menu = new QMenu;
00166     menu->addAction(tr("Copy"), this, SLOT(copy_selected_search_results()), QKeySequence::Copy);
00167     menu->addSeparator();
00168     menu->addAction(tr("Select All"), this, SLOT(select_all_search_results()), QKeySequence::SelectAll);
00169     menu->exec(m_results_view->mapToGlobal(position + QPoint(42,30)));
00170 }
00171 
00172 void UISearchResultsWidget::update_results_status()
00173 {
00174     int numberOfRowsFound = m_results_model->rowCount();
00175     int numberOfRowsDisplayed = m_proxy_model->rowCount();
00176     if (numberOfRowsFound == 0)
00177     {
00178         m_results_status->setText(tr("No matches"));
00179     }
00180     else if (numberOfRowsFound == 1)
00181     {
00182         if (numberOfRowsFound != numberOfRowsDisplayed)
00183         {
00184             m_results_status->setText(tr("%1 of %2 match").arg(numberOfRowsDisplayed).arg(numberOfRowsFound));
00185         }
00186         else
00187         {
00188             m_results_status->setText(tr("%1 match").arg(numberOfRowsFound));
00189         }
00190     }
00191     else
00192     {
00193         if (numberOfRowsFound != numberOfRowsDisplayed)
00194         {
00195             m_results_status->setText(tr("%1 of %2 matches").arg(numberOfRowsDisplayed).arg(numberOfRowsFound));
00196         }
00197         else
00198         {
00199             m_results_status->setText(tr("%1 matches").arg(numberOfRowsFound));
00200         }
00201     }
00202 }
